My First Personal Website

This is the first website that I ever fully developed and finished. Previously I just had experienced with web development and I thought I should finally develop a website for myself. I tried to keep website rather simple as this was my first and at that time too many features could ruin the website or make it unstable.

This website didn't have any animations or interaction but as I wanted to create somewhat professional work environment I managed to built my own gulp.js workflow. It was quite a challange but I managed to implement browser-sync, and even started to use SASS preprocessor right away. For a second I even thought of using Jade but I felt that I should not touch that for couple more websites.
